thread.section_title: Hotel Le Clement - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location and great value
thread.title_full: Great location and great value - Review of Hotel Le Clement, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Ross B
title: Great location and great value
text:
The location of this hotel is hard to beat. You can easily walk to the Louvre and Notre Dame. You can get to many of the subway lines within a 10 minute walk, one of them within a 2 minute walk. There are good restaurants nearby.
The room itself was quite small, but that's to be expected given the location. The walls also transmitted a decent amount of noise from other rooms, but that ended up not being a big deal because our neighbors weren't too noisy during sleeping hours.
The front desk were friendly and helpful as well.
Overall, a great value for this location, and if you don't mind the small rooms or the possibility of some noise from other rooms, I would recommend.
